text: Erzsébet Vass (née Metzker; 20 March 1915 – 8 August 1980) was a Hungarian politician, who served as Speaker of the National Assembly of Hungary between 1963 and 1967. She was the first woman who held this position in Hungary. ==References== * Istvánné Vass Biography by Judit Villám Category:1915 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Women members of the National Assembly of Hungary Category:Speakers of the National Assembly of Hungary Category:Members of the Hungarian Socialist Workers' Party Category:20th-century women politicians
title: Erzsébet Metzker Vass
